Sound.comm: Sound quality is crisp and clear with good bass response.

cont.entity_a: Very balanced, clean, and clear sound with detailed upper frequencies. Capable of very deep bass, but requires EQ for enhanced bass. Excellent sound quality for the cost, especially in the ~$60 range.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is good but lacks longevity, with frequent breakdowns. Suitable for studio monitoring with accurate sound representation.

cont.entity_a: Extremely durable with sturdy build quality, suitable for long-term use. Long-term users report high satisfaction and longevity.
cont.entity_b: Durability issues with ear cups and headband material. Issues with right ear speaker malfunctioning over time.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable fit with a great adjustment system.
cont.entity_b: Some users report discomfort due to tight fit. Heavy clamping force can cause discomfort over long periods.

cont.entity_a: Cord is well-made, sturdy, and coiled for extended reach.
cont.entity_b: Cord is heavy and coiled, causing discomfort and inconvenience. Cord length and weight are problematic for some users.

cont.entity_a: Arrived well packaged with a plug adapter and carrying bag.
Lightweight and foldable for improved portability. Not as portable as some other models due to long coiled cord.
Ear pads are prone to flaking and need replacement over time.
Some concerns about authenticity and build quality of newer units.

cont.entity_b: Good for noise isolation but not active noise cancellation.
